mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRESCH_NOTICE_BOARD WHERE SCH_CD = #{schCd} AND NOTICE_TYPE = #{noticeType} ORDER BY CREATED_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRESCH_NOTICE_BOARD (SCH_CD, NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#{schCd}, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
